duties_responsibilities.duty: Ensure timely and accurate end-to-end accounts payable processes, work with vendors, review vendor statements, and resolve queries.
Manage loan-level detail of the pledged loans in the warehouse facility and preparation of the borrowing base files.
Confirm all intercompany accounts eliminate; reconcile all liability accounts (monthly) and various month-end duties such as aging schedules and journal entries.

Keep track of all payments and expenditures including AP (bill.com and Brex), payroll entries (through Gusto), retailer/lienholder payoffs (ACH/wires through banking portal) at the specific entity level.
Assist in audit-related items including providing PBCs related to payables/liabilities and prepare the yearly 1099s and 1098s; file and pay various state agencies (Dept of Rev) for taxes.
Manage end-to-end process around insurance premiums (hazard and flood) including monthly upfront premiums, payment of 'outside insurance', reconciling auto-debited premiums, insurance claims, etc.
Complete special projects such as creating a subledger for escrows and reconciling escrows at the loan level and cleaning up benefit liabilities/adjustments with Carriers.
Prepare bonus calculations (for payroll purposes) and help streamline any processes related to payables.
Handle various ad hoc requests/projects from the Controller (related to payables/liabilities).

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Accounting or Finance (Master's preferred)
